patthana18.27:1.1_0: Saraṇaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.27:1.1_1: Saraṇaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.27:1.1_2: Saraṇaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo noāsavo ca naaraṇo noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana18.27:2.1_0: Saraṇaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.27:3.1_0: Araṇaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.27:4.1_0: Araṇaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
